name: Spirit Spells
summary: Your ability to confront incorporeal menaces develops into full-fledged spellcasting.
description:
Your ability to confront incorporeal menaces develops into full-fledged spellcasting. Choose a 1st-level occult spell. You can Cast this Spell as an innate occult spell. At 6th level, you gain a 2nd-level occult spell, and at 8th level, you gain a 3rd-level occult spell. Each of these spells must have the divination, enchantment, or necromancy trait. You can cast each of these spells once per day.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
